landing.headline: Love Calculator
landing.intro: Experience the world's most sophisticated love compatibility calculator powered by our exclusive Affinity Quotient (AQ) algorithm. Get scientific analysis with detailed breakdowns of your compatibility across multiple dimensions.
landing.subtitle: Test Your Love Compatibility
landing.description: Enter your names to discover your love percentage!
landing.newAlgorithmBadge: ğŸ”¬ NEW: Powered by Affinity Quotient Algorithm
landing.poweredByAQTitle: ğŸ§¬ Powered by Affinity Quotient Technology
landing.poweredByAQDescription: Unlike simple love calculators, our advanced AQ algorithm analyzes your compatibility across five scientific dimensions including phonetic harmony, letter frequency patterns, numerological compatibility, vowel balance, and psychological first impressions.
landing.algorithmDescription1: Our exclusive Affinity Quotient (AQ) algorithm represents a breakthrough in compatibility analysis. Unlike basic name calculators that use simple hash functions, our system applies academic research in linguistics, psychology, and numerology.
landing.algorithmDescription2: We analyze names across five scientific dimensions to create a comprehensive compatibility profile that considers not just letters, but linguistic patterns, phonetic harmony, and numerological significance.
landing.academicFoundationDescription: Our algorithm incorporates principles from published linguistic research, phonetic analysis, and mathematical compatibility theory.
landing.fivePillarsTitle: The Five Pillars of Compatibility Analysis
landing.fivePillarsDescription: We analyze names across five scientific dimensions to create a comprehensive compatibility profile that considers not just letters, but linguistic patterns, phonetic harmony, and numerological significance.
landing.pillar1Description: First letter psychology and instant impression compatibility
landing.pillar5Description: Rhythm, flow, and auditory harmony analysis
landing.funEntertainmentDescription: Our playful approach creates entertaining compatibility scores perfect for social sharing.
landing.consistentResultsDescription: The same name combination will always produce the same love percentage for reliability.
landing.shareableFunDescription: Generate beautiful images of your results to share on social media and with friends.
landing.nameCompatibilityDescription: Name compatibility is a playful and entertaining way to test relationships and spark conversations. It's a great icebreaker and entertainment tool for parties, social media, and fun times with friends!
landing.relationshipQuizTitle: Relationship Quiz â€“ Are You a Perfect Match?
landing.relationshipQuizDescription: Want more than just a love calculator? Take our comprehensive relationship quiz to dive deeper into your compatibility and discover what makes your relationship unique.
landing.loveCompatibilityTestOnlineDescription: Ready to discover your love compatibility? Our online love calculator is completely free and provides instant results. Test your relationship compatibility now and see what the stars have in store!
landing.funLoveTestToShareTitle: Fun Love Test to Share With Friends
landing.funLoveTestDescription: Our love calculator isn't just fun for you â€“ it's perfect for sharing! Generate beautiful result images that look great on Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, and other social platforms.
landing.shareYourResultsDescription: Turn your love score into viral content!
landing.entertainmentDisclaimer: For Entertainment Only: This is a fun activity designed for entertainment and social sharing, not actual dating or relationship advice!

dobCalculator.title: Date of Birth Compatibility Calculator
dobCalculator.description: Discover your romantic compatibility based on your birth dates! Our algorithm analyzes birthday patterns, age differences, and numerological factors to reveal fascinating relationship insights.
dobCalculator.scientificFoundationDescription: Based on chronobiology research, numerology principles, and seasonal psychology studies for comprehensive temporal analysis.
dobCalculator.detailedBreakdownDescription: Get visual charts and detailed analysis across five compatibility dimensions with personalized insights for your relationship.
dobCalculator.socialSharingDescription: Perfect for social media sharing, party games, and fun conversations with friends. Instant results you can share anywhere!
dobCalculator.birthdayCompatibilityDescription: Birthday compatibility is a fascinating way to explore relationship dynamics through the lens of time and cosmic timing. It's an entertaining tool that combines ancient wisdom with modern analysis for fun insights into your connections!
dobCalculator.ageHarmonyDescription: Analyzes age differences and life stage compatibility - closer ages get higher scores
dobCalculator.seasonalPatternsDescription: Birth month personality traits and seasonal energy matching
dobCalculator.numerologicalPathsDescription: Life path number compatibility using ancient numerology
dobCalculator.cosmicSyncDescription: Birth day patterns, celestial timing, and cosmic connection analysis
dobCalculator.generationalEnergyDescription: Birth year cohort analysis and era-based compatibility

dobCalculator.temporalPsychologyDescription: Research in chronobiology suggests that birth timing can influence personality traits, energy levels, and life perspectives. Our algorithm captures these temporal patterns to assess compatibility.
dobCalculator.lifeStageSynchronizationDescription: Age differences and generational alignment play crucial roles in relationship dynamics. We analyze these factors to predict harmony in life goals and experiences.
dobCalculator.numerologicalWisdomDescription: Ancient numerology systems have tracked life path compatibility for millennia. Our algorithm incorporates these time-tested principles for deeper insights.
dobCalculator.seasonalInfluencesDescription: Birth season affects everything from vitamin D exposure to early life experiences. These subtle influences can shape personality and relationship preferences.
dobCalculator.birthdayCompatibilityTestOnlineDescripti: Ready to discover your birth date compatibility? Our online birthday calculator is completely free and provides instant results with detailed analysis. Test your temporal harmony now!
dobCalculator.howAlgorithmWorksTitle: How Our Birthday Compatibility Algorithm Works
dobCalculator.algorithmFoundationDescription: Our exclusive Birthday Harmony Algorithm represents a breakthrough in temporal compatibility analysis. Unlike basic date calculators that use simple arithmetic, our system applies academic research in chronobiology, numerology, and seasonal psychology.
dobCalculator.comprehensiveCompatibilityProfile: We analyze birth dates across five scientific dimensions to create a comprehensive compatibility profile that considers not just when you were born, but how those cosmic timing patterns influence your relationship potential.
dobCalculator.algorithmIncorporates: Our algorithm incorporates principles from chronobiology research, traditional numerology systems, and seasonal personality studies to provide scientifically-informed entertainment.

zodiacCalculator.title: Zodiac Compatibility Calculator
zodiacCalculator.description: Discover the cosmic connection between you and your partner with our advanced zodiac compatibility calculator. Test your star signs and explore astrological love matches with celestial insights.
zodiacCalculator.traditionalAstrologyDescription: Based on centuries-old astrological wisdom and traditional zodiac compatibility patterns used by astrologers worldwide.
zodiacCalculator.comprehensiveAnalysisDescription: Our algorithm analyzes elemental harmony, planetary rulers, modalities, and cosmic aspects for deep compatibility insights.
zodiacCalculator.cosmicEntertainmentDescription: Fun, engaging way to explore personality traits and relationship dynamics through the lens of astrology.
zodiacCalculator.zodiacCompatibilityDescription: Whether you're a fiery Aries seeking harmony with a grounded Taurus, or a dreamy Pisces connecting with an analytical Virgo, our zodiac compatibility calculator provides entertainment and insights into the cosmic dance of relationships.
zodiacCalculator.howAlgorithmWorksTitle: How Our Zodiac Compatibility Algorithm Works
zodiacCalculator.exclusiveCelestialHarmonyAlgorithm: Our exclusive Celestial Harmony Algorithm combines traditional astrological principles with modern compatibility analysis to provide you with accurate and entertaining zodiac compatibility scores.
zodiacCalculator.systemAppliesTraditionalAstrology: The system applies traditional astrology methods, analyzing the fundamental relationships between zodiac signs, their ruling planets, elemental properties, and modal characteristics to determine cosmic compatibility.
zodiacCalculator.algorithmIncorporates: Our algorithm incorporates classical astrological principles including elemental interactions, planetary rulerships, modal energies, and traditional aspect relationships between zodiac signs.

zodiacCalculator.planetaryInfluencesDescription: Each zodiac sign is ruled by specific planets that influence characteristics, communication styles, and emotional expressions in relationships.

zodiacCalculator.entertainmentOnlyDescription: This zodiac compatibility calculator is designed for entertainment purposes only. While based on traditional astrological principles, results should not be used as the sole basis for important relationship decisions. Astrology is a belief system, and compatibility depends on many personal factors beyond zodiac signs.
zodiacCalculator.zodiacCompatibilityTestOnlineDescription: Experience the magic of astrological compatibility with our comprehensive zodiac calculator. Discover cosmic connections, explore elemental harmony, and gain insights into your celestial love story.

description.10: Very different personalities - proceed with caution!
description.20: This might be a challenging match, but every relationship is unique.
description.30: Significant differences, but opposites sometimes attract!
description.40: Some challenges ahead, but love can overcome obstacles.
description.50: Moderate compatibility - friendship might work better than romance.
description.60: Good compatibility with some areas to work on together.
description.70: Very good match with great potential for a wonderful relationship.
description.80: Excellent compatibility! You complement each other beautifully.
description.90: You two are absolutely perfect for each other! This is a once-in-a-lifetime connection.

relationshipQuiz.title: Relationship Compatibility Quiz
relationshipQuiz.subtitle: Discover How Strong Your Relationship Really Is
relationshipQuiz.description: Take our comprehensive 8-question relationship quiz to get insights into your relationship strength and compatibility.

q1.question: How often do you and your partner have meaningful conversations?

options.opt1: Daily
options.opt2: A few times a week
options.opt3: Weekly
options.opt4: Rarely

q2.question: When you disagree, how do you typically resolve conflicts?

options.opt1: Talk it through calmly
options.opt2: Need some time but work it out
options.opt3: Argue but make up quickly
options.opt4: Avoid the topic

q3.question: How aligned are your future goals and dreams?

options.opt1: Perfectly aligned
options.opt2: Mostly similar
options.opt3: Some differences
options.opt4: Very different

q4.question: How much quality time do you spend together?

options.opt1: Plenty, and we enjoy it
options.opt2: Good amount
options.opt3: Could be more
options.opt4: Not enough

q5.question: How do you handle each other's friends and family?

options.opt1: Love them all
options.opt2: Get along well
options.opt3: Some challenges
options.opt4: Frequent issues

q6.question: How well do you communicate your needs and feelings?

options.opt1: Very openly
options.opt2: Pretty well
options.opt3: Sometimes struggle
options.opt4: Rarely express them

q7.question: How do you support each other during tough times?

options.opt1: Always there for each other
options.opt2: Usually supportive
options.opt3: Sometimes
options.opt4: Struggle with this

q8.question: How compatible are your lifestyle preferences?

options.opt1: Very compatible
options.opt2: Mostly compatible
options.opt3: Some differences
options.opt4: Quite different

perfectMatch.title: Perfect Match! ğŸ’–
perfectMatch.message: You two are relationship goals! Your compatibility is off the charts.

greatCompatibility.title: Great Compatibility! ğŸ’•

workInProgress.title: Work in Progress! ğŸ’ª

communicationStyleQuiz.title: Communication Style Quiz
communicationStyleQuiz.subtitle: Discover Your Unique Communication Patterns
communicationStyleQuiz.description: Understand how you and your partner communicate differently and learn to bridge any gaps for better connection.

q1.question: When your partner is upset, what's your first instinct?

options.opt1: Listen carefully and ask questions to understand
options.opt2: Offer practical solutions to fix the problem
options.opt3: Give them a hug and emotional support
options.opt4: Give them space until they're ready to talk

q2.question: How do you prefer to discuss important relationship decisions?

options.opt1: Face-to-face with lots of discussion and emotion
options.opt2: Calmly with facts, pros and cons laid out
options.opt3: Over time with gentle conversations and check-ins
options.opt4: Directly and efficiently to reach a conclusion

q3.question: When you disagree with your partner, you tend to:

options.opt1: Express your feelings immediately and passionately
options.opt2: Think it through before presenting logical arguments
options.opt3: Focus on understanding their perspective first
options.opt4: State your position clearly and expect the same

q4.question: Your ideal way to share good news is:

options.opt1: Call them immediately, full of excitement and emotion
options.opt2: Plan how to share it in an organized, clear way
options.opt3: Tell them in a quiet moment with warmth and connection
options.opt4: Share the facts straightforwardly and move on

q5.question: When giving feedback to your partner, you:

options.opt1: Share your feelings openly about how their actions affected you
options.opt2: Present specific examples and suggest concrete improvements
options.opt3: Emphasize their strengths first, then gently mention areas to work on
options.opt4: Be direct about what needs to change without sugarcoating

q6.question: During conflicts, what matters most to you?

options.opt1: That both of you can express your true feelings
options.opt2: Finding a logical solution that makes sense
options.opt3: Maintaining connection and understanding throughout
options.opt4: Resolving the issue quickly and clearly

q7.question: How do you show love through communication?

options.opt1: Through heartfelt words and emotional expressions
options.opt2: By remembering details and following through on promises
options.opt3: With gentle encouragement and validating their feelings
options.opt4: By being honest and straightforward about your commitment

q8.question: When your partner needs to vent, you prefer to:

options.opt1: Match their energy and share similar experiences
options.opt2: Ask clarifying questions to help them think through it
options.opt3: Listen quietly and offer comfort and reassurance
options.opt4: Listen briefly then help them move toward solutions

q9.question: Your communication style is most energized by:

options.opt1: Deep emotional conversations about feelings and dreams
options.opt2: Interesting discussions about ideas, plans, and possibilities
options.opt3: Heart-to-heart talks that build intimacy and connection
options.opt4: Efficient exchanges that accomplish goals and solve problems

q10.question: When you need support from your partner, you prefer they:

options.opt1: Let you express everything you're feeling without judgment
options.opt2: Help you analyze the situation and brainstorm solutions
options.opt3: Offer comfort, validation, and reassurance
options.opt4: Give you clear advice and next steps

expressive.title: Expressive Communicator ğŸ­
expressive.description: You communicate with passion, emotion, and enthusiasm. You value deep conversations and emotional connection.

analytical.title: Analytical Communicator ğŸ§
analytical.description: You prefer logical, structured communication. You value clear information and practical solutions.

supportive.title: Supportive Communicator ğŸ¤—
supportive.description: You prioritize understanding, empathy, and maintaining harmony in your communications.

direct.title: Direct Communicator âš¡
direct.description: You value efficiency, honesty, and straightforward communication. You get to the point quickly.
tips: Add more warmth to your tone

loveLanguageAssessment.title: Love Language Assessment
loveLanguageAssessment.subtitle: Discover How You Give and Receive Love
loveLanguageAssessment.description: Discover your primary way of expressing and receiving love through this comprehensive assessment.

q1.question: What makes you feel most loved by your partner?

options.opt1: When they tell me they love me and appreciate me
options.opt2: When we spend uninterrupted time together
options.opt3: When they give me a hug or hold my hand
options.opt4: When they help me with tasks or do things for me
options.opt5: When they surprise me with thoughtful gifts

q2.question: When you want to show your partner you care, you usually:

options.opt1: Write them a heartfelt note or send sweet messages
options.opt2: Plan a special date or activity together
options.opt3: Give them physical affection like hugs and kisses
options.opt4: Do something helpful like cooking or cleaning
options.opt5: Buy them something they've been wanting

q3.question: Your ideal evening with your partner involves:

options.opt1: Deep conversations where you share your thoughts and dreams
options.opt2: Doing an activity together with phones put away
options.opt3: Cuddling on the couch while watching a movie
options.opt4: Working together on a project or tackling household tasks
options.opt5: Going shopping together or exchanging small surprises

q4.question: Which gesture would make you feel most appreciated?

options.opt1: A sincere compliment about something you did well
options.opt2: Your partner putting their phone away to focus completely on you
options.opt3: A spontaneous back rub or hand massage
options.opt4: Coming home to find your partner has done your least favorite chore
options.opt5: A small gift that shows they were thinking of you

q5.question: When your partner is away, what do you miss most?

options.opt1: Hearing their voice and the sweet things they say
options.opt2: The time you spend together and shared experiences
options.opt3: Their physical presence and affectionate touches
options.opt4: The way they help with daily life and responsibilities
options.opt5: The little surprises and thoughtful gestures

q6.question: Physical affection is important to you because:

options.opt1: It's a way to communicate love without words
options.opt2: It makes you feel connected during quality time together
options.opt3: It makes you feel secure and loved
options.opt4: It shows your partner cares about your comfort and well-being
options.opt5: It's often paired with giving or receiving something special

q7.question: How do you prefer to be comforted when upset?

options.opt1: Words of encouragement and reassurance
options.opt2: Having your partner's undivided attention and presence
options.opt3: Physical comfort like hugs, hand-holding, or cuddling
options.opt4: Having your partner take care of practical things for you
options.opt5: Being surprised with something to cheer you up

q8.question: When your partner helps you, you feel most loved when they:

options.opt1: Tell you how much they enjoy helping you
options.opt2: Make the time to help despite their busy schedule
options.opt3: Work alongside you with physical closeness
options.opt4: Notice what you need without being asked
options.opt5: Bring you tools or supplies to make the task easier

options.opt1: A handwritten love letter
options.opt2: A day trip planned just for the two of you
options.opt3: A surprise massage or long hug
options.opt4: Coming home to a clean house and dinner made
options.opt5: A thoughtful gift that reminded them of you

q10.question: What would make you feel most special on your birthday?

options.opt1: A heartfelt speech about what you mean to your partner
options.opt2: Having your partner's complete attention all day
options.opt3: Lots of affectionate touches and physical closeness
options.opt4: Having everything planned and organized so you can relax
options.opt5: A perfect gift that shows how well they know you

wordsOfAffirmation.title: Words of Affirmation ğŸ’¬
wordsOfAffirmation.description: You thrive on verbal appreciation, compliments, and encouraging words. Hearing 'I love you' means the world to you.
partnerTips: Tell them you love them regularly
Praise them in front of others

qualityTime.title: Quality Time â°
qualityTime.description: You feel most loved when you have your partner's undivided attention. Being together and creating memories matters most.

physicalTouch.title: Physical Touch ğŸ¤—
physicalTouch.description: Physical affection makes you feel most connected and loved. Hugs, kisses, and gentle touches speak louder than words.
characteristics: Feels unloved when touch is lacking

actsOfService.title: Acts of Service ğŸ› ï¸
actsOfService.description: You feel loved when your partner helps with tasks and responsibilities. Actions speak louder than words for you.
characteristics: May feel burdened when help isn't offered
partnerTips: Take care of tasks they dislike

receivingGifts.title: Receiving Gifts ğŸ
receivingGifts.description: Thoughtful gifts and gestures make you feel most appreciated. It's not about expense, but the thought and effort behind it.
characteristics: Feels hurt when occasions are forgotten
partnerTips: Pay attention to things they mention wanting

futureGoalsCompatibility.title: Future Goals Compatibility Quiz
futureGoalsCompatibility.subtitle: See How Aligned Your Life Dreams Are
futureGoalsCompatibility.description: Discover how compatible your future goals, lifestyle preferences, and life plans are with your partner.

q1.question: In 5 years, what's most important to you career-wise?

options.opt1: Climbing the corporate ladder and achieving leadership roles
options.opt2: Finding work-life balance with a stable, fulfilling job
options.opt3: Being my own boss and running a successful business
options.opt4: Having the flexibility to travel and work remotely

q2.question: What's your ideal work schedule in the future?

options.opt1: Full-time career with potential for overtime when needed
options.opt2: Standard full-time with clear work-life boundaries
options.opt3: Part-time or flexible schedule for family/personal time
options.opt4: Freelance or entrepreneurial with complete control over time

q3.question: When do you see yourself having children (if at all)?

options.opt1: Already have them or want them within the next 2-3 years
options.opt2: In the next 5-7 years when we're more established
options.opt3: Maybe someday, but it's not a priority right now
options.opt4: I don't want children or am unsure about it

q4.question: How important is it to live near family?

options.opt1: Essential - within 30 minutes of parents/siblings
options.opt2: Preferred - same city or within a few hours drive
options.opt3: Nice but not necessary - same state or region is fine
options.opt4: Not important - we can live anywhere that's best for us

q5.question: Where do you see yourself living in 10 years?

options.opt1: In a big city with lots of opportunities and excitement
options.opt2: In the suburbs with a nice house and good schools
options.opt3: In a small town or rural area for peace and quiet
options.opt4: Traveling frequently or living in different places

q6.question: What's your vision for friendships and social life?

options.opt1: Large circle of friends with frequent social gatherings
options.opt2: Close-knit group of friends with regular but balanced socializing
options.opt3: Small group of very close friends with occasional meetups
options.opt4: Prefer quiet time together, minimal social obligations

q7.question: How important is financial security to your future happiness?

options.opt1: Essential - I want to be wealthy and financially independent
options.opt2: Very important - I want to be comfortable and debt-free
options.opt3: Somewhat important - enough to cover needs and some wants
options.opt4: Not very important - money doesn't buy happiness

q8.question: How do you want to handle big purchases and financial decisions?

options.opt1: Always discuss and agree together on everything over $100
options.opt2: Discuss major purchases over $500-1000 together
options.opt3: Have individual freedom for smaller amounts, discuss large ones
options.opt4: Mostly independent financial decisions with occasional check-ins

q9.question: What's your approach to major life decisions?

options.opt1: Plan everything carefully with detailed strategies
options.opt2: Have a general plan but stay flexible for opportunities
options.opt3: Go with the flow and see what life brings
options.opt4: Follow your heart and intuition above all else

q10.question: How important is continuing education and personal growth?

options.opt1: Extremely important - always learning new skills and growing
options.opt2: Important - pursuing additional education or certifications
options.opt3: Somewhat important - learning when opportunities arise
options.opt4: Not a priority - focus on other life goals instead

highlyCompatible.title: Future Soulmates! ğŸŒŸ
highlyCompatible.description: Your future goals are incredibly aligned! You both want similar things and have compatible timelines for achieving your dreams.
highlyCompatible.message: Future Soulmates! Your future goals are incredibly aligned!

wellMatched.title: Great Life Partners! ğŸ’«
wellMatched.description: You have strong compatibility in your future goals with some areas that might need discussion and compromise.
wellMatched.message: Great Life Partners! You have strong compatibility in your future goals.

someAlignment.description: You share many similar goals but may need to work through some differences in priorities and timelines.
someAlignment.message: Good Foundation! You share many similar goals.

conflictResolutionQuiz.title: Conflict Resolution Style Quiz
conflictResolutionQuiz.subtitle: Discover How You Handle Disagreements
conflictResolutionQuiz.description: Learn your natural approach to conflict and how to work better with your partner during disagreements.

q1.question: When you and your partner disagree about something important, your first instinct is to:

options.opt1: Find a solution that works for both of you
options.opt2: Argue your point until they understand you're right
options.opt3: Give in to keep the peace and avoid conflict
options.opt4: Change the subject or walk away from the conversation
options.opt5: Meet halfway and each compromise something

q2.question: During a heated argument, you typically:

options.opt1: Try to understand their perspective and find common ground
options.opt2: Get louder and more insistent about your position
options.opt3: Back down and apologize even if you disagree
options.opt4: Shut down emotionally and stop participating
options.opt5: Suggest taking a break and finding a middle ground later

q3.question: Your approach to winning arguments is:

options.opt1: Arguments should be about finding truth, not winning
options.opt2: I usually win because I'm well-prepared and persistent
options.opt3: I don't like winning arguments, it hurts relationships
options.opt4: I try to avoid arguments altogether
options.opt5: I'm willing to win some and lose some

q4.question: When you're clearly right about something but your partner disagrees:

options.opt1: I focus on helping them understand my perspective
options.opt2: I keep arguing until they admit I'm right
options.opt3: I let them think they're right to keep harmony
options.opt4: I drop it and move on to something else
options.opt5: I present my case once and then let it go

options.opt1: Want to talk it through completely until you both understand
options.opt2: Expect an acknowledgment that your point was valid
options.opt3: Apologize first to restore harmony
options.opt4: Hope it blows over and things go back to normal
options.opt5: Suggest finding a compromise that works for both

q6.question: When your partner brings up a complaint about you:

options.opt1: Listen carefully and work together on solutions
options.opt2: Defend yourself and explain why you acted that way
options.opt3: Apologize and try to make them feel better
options.opt4: Feel overwhelmed and need space to process
options.opt5: Acknowledge their point and offer to meet in the middle

q7.question: Your biggest fear during conflicts is:

options.opt1: That you won't be able to solve the problem together
options.opt2: That your partner won't respect your perspective
options.opt3: That the conflict will damage your relationship
options.opt4: That emotions will get too intense and overwhelming
options.opt5: That neither of you will be satisfied with the outcome

q8.question: When discussing a problem, you prefer to:

options.opt1: Take as much time as needed to fully explore the issue
options.opt2: Present your case clearly and expect the same from them
options.opt3: Focus on feelings and maintaining connection
options.opt4: Keep discussions brief and solution-focused
options.opt5: Find quick compromises to resolve things efficiently

options.opt1: Finding creative solutions that work for everyone
options.opt2: Standing firm on important principles and values
options.opt3: Maintaining love and connection through difficult times
options.opt4: Staying calm and not escalating emotional situations
options.opt5: Being fair and finding middle ground quickly

q10.question: When you've hurt your partner's feelings, you:

options.opt1: Want to understand exactly how and why, then work on solutions
options.opt2: Explain your intentions and expect them to understand
options.opt3: Apologize immediately and focus on making them feel better
options.opt4: Feel bad but need time to process before discussing it
options.opt5: Apologize and suggest ways to prevent it from happening again

collaborative.title: Collaborative Problem-Solver ğŸ¤
collaborative.description: You believe in working together to find win-win solutions. You value both your needs and your partner's equally.
tips: Be patient when your partner needs time
Don't force collaboration when quick decisions are needed
partnerAdvice: Give them time to work through issues together

accommodating.title: Harmony Keeper ğŸ•Šï¸
accommodating.description: You prioritize relationship peace and your partner's happiness. You're willing to sacrifice your preferences for harmony.
challenges: Problems may not get fully resolved
Partner may not know your true feelings
tips: Address issues before they build up
partnerAdvice: Encourage them to share their true feelings
Check in on their needs regularly
Don't take advantage of their accommodation

avoiding.title: Conflict Avoider ğŸšª
avoiding.description: You prefer to step away from conflicts and let tensions resolve naturally. You need space to process emotions.
strengths: Gives time for emotions to cool
challenges: Issues can build up over time
tips: Schedule specific times to discuss issues
Practice staying present for short periods
Return to address problems after cooling off
partnerAdvice: Give them space when they need it
Schedule calm times to discuss issues
Be patient with their processing time

compromising.title: Fair Negotiator âš–ï¸
compromising.description: You believe in fairness and finding middle ground. You're willing to give some to get some in most situations.
challenges: Can become routine rather than thoughtful
May avoid dealing with core problems
tips: Sometimes dig deeper for win-win solutions
Make sure compromises feel fair to both
Address underlying needs, not just surface issues
partnerAdvice: Speak up when compromises don't feel balanced
Work together on more collaborative solutions sometimes

competing.title: Direct Competitor ğŸ†
competing.description: You prefer to stand firm on your positions and advocate strongly for your viewpoint. You value being right and winning.
tips: Ask questions instead of just arguing
partnerAdvice: Stand your ground on important issues

analytical.title: Analytical Resolver ğŸ§
analytical.description: You prefer to step back, analyze the situation, and find logical solutions. You process conflicts thoughtfully.
strengths: Gives time for emotions to cool
challenges: Issues can build up over time
tips: Schedule specific times to discuss issues
Practice staying present for short periods
Return to address problems after cooling off
partnerAdvice: Give them space when they need it
Schedule calm times to discuss issues
Be patient with their processing time
